definition: Committee for Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland (North Korean)
pinyin: Zu3 guo2 He2 ping2 Tong3 yi1 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

sentences.english: Entirely devoted to the Party, the young soldier gave his life for his country.
sentences.chinese: 对党无限忠诚，这位年轻的士兵为祖国献出了生命。

sentences.english: On the domain of the motherland, you are always included.
sentences.chinese: 在祖国的版图上，有你抹不掉的位置。

sentences.english: To de fend our country we must strengthen ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 为了保卫祖国，我们必须自强不息。

sentences.english: Color symbol, the blue symbolizes joy and win loyal to our motherland.
sentences.chinese: 色象征欢乐和胜利，蓝色象征忠于祖国。

sentences.english: After he graduated, he joined the army and devoted himself to making his motherland safe.
sentences.chinese: 毕业之后他参加了部队，献身于保卫祖国。

sentences.english: They can fight for their motherlands and it is wonderful to bring honor.
sentences.chinese: 他们可以为祖国而战，这是极大的荣誉。

sentences.english: I will offer myself to the state as emergency arise.
sentences.chinese: 一旦发生紧急情况，我一定会为祖国献身的。

sentences.english: The Liberation Arm is the steel Great Wall of motherland.
sentences.chinese: 解放军是祖国的钢铁长城。

sentences.english: Learn English to server our nation country.
sentences.chinese: 学好外语是为了更好的建设祖国。

sentences.english: It summarizes the famous doctors experience, and promotes traditional Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 总结名医经验，弘扬祖国医学。

sentences.english: We will never forget the day that HongKong returned.
sentences.chinese: 我们永远不会忘记香港回归祖国的那一天。

sentences.english: Our great motherland has the very centuries -old history.
sentences.chinese: 我们伟大祖国有非常悠久的历史。

sentences.english: I can just say, i only went around the motherland, did not really arrive in all places of China.
sentences.chinese: 走这一圈也只能说走到了祖国各地，并不真是走遍。

sentences.english: We are very happy to see our motherland becoming stronger.
sentences.chinese: 我们高兴地看到，我们的祖国变得更加强盛。

sentences.english: The honour of finally appearing for his country means more to the player than the name of the opponents.
sentences.chinese: 能够为祖国效力对球员来说意味着无尚的光荣。

sentences.english: And they keep the national flag of China flying in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 他们让祖国国旗保持在风中高高飘扬。

definition: guard home, defend the country (idiom); national defense
descendants of the Fiery Emperor and the Yellow Emperor (i.e. Han Chinese people)
foreign lands and places (idiom); living as expatriate
